quotes.quote: Personality is like a charioteer with two headstrong horses, each wanting to go in different directions.
Two things define your personality, the way you manage things when you have nothing, and the way you behave when you have everything.
It's beauty that captures your attention; personality that captures your heart.
I use bits and pieces of others personalities to form my own.
Your personality is the only permanent thing in your, ultimately, temporary life...that's all the more reason to cherish it.
All too often our personality is nothing more than psychological clothing that we wear to hide our true self from the world.
Let your personality be your profit and not your punishment.
The note of the perfect personality is not rebellion, but peace.
We continue to shape our personality all our life. If we knew ourselves perfectly, we should die.
Maybe that's what a person's personality is: the difference between the inside and the outside.
Having a passive personality, is a soft way to live a dead life.
Personality is an unbroken series of successful gestures.
Personality has power to uplift, power to depress, power to curse, and power to bless.
I am what is mine. Personality is the original personal property.
I've trained myself to illuminate the things in my personality that are likable and to hide and protect the things that are less likeable.
There is nothing more attractive than a great positive personality. Its beauty never fades away with time.
Personality is in the very intention of the evolution of life, and the human personality is just one mode in which this intention is realized.
If you want to know my personality, look through my bedroom window and see how I act.
Personality is to a man what perfume is to a flower.
Personality is lower than partiality.
I want freedom for the full expression of my personality.
When you fall for their personality, everything about them becomes beautiful.
I think that personality traits that come through when somebody is really sincere is what makes them beautiful.
Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
Humility is no substitute for a good personality.
Where there is personality, there is discord.
An ugly personality destroys a pretty face.
Our personality should be impenetrable even to ourselves.
When people label you by saying that you have attitude.Just tell them that you have a personality which is unshakable and unaffected by what people say about you.
Personality is a mask you believe in.
